au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.name: NVS_L1=20m_L2=2m_apx2p5_OCT2014
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.initScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Drive detector to short position driveDet(1200,0) # Drive entrance aperture to 50 mm square driveEntRotAp(180) # Drive guide to ga driveGuide(guideConfig.ga) # Drive entrance aperture to 180 (for guide g4) driveEntRotAp(180) #set sample ap to 0 mm sics.drive('apx', 0) # Drive beamstops up selBs(1) # set beamcentres sics.set('beamcenterx', 97.18) sics.set('beamcenterz', 96.47)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preTransmissionScript: # Move the beamstop out driveBsx(41, 100) # Drive attenuator to 270 driveAtt(270)
au.gov.ansto.bragg.quokka.experiment.mod.preScatteringScript: # Drive attenuator to safe value driveAtt(330) # Move the beamstop in driveBsx(41, 0) driveBsz(262)
